title: Training Material Distribution
summary: Oracle's system for pushing training materials to bot inboxes. Oracle finds valuable content (videos, PDFs, articles) and distributes them to specific bots for learning.
tooltip:
ðŸ”® Training Distribution
Oracle's system for providing training materials to bots. Pushes videos, PDFs, and articles to bot inboxes for learning.
description: Oracle's training distribution system. This capability allows Oracle to add training materials (YouTube videos, PDFs, URLs, text) to individual bot inboxes. Bots check their inbox on boot, process the materials, extract knowledge, and delete the originals (inbox protocol). Oracle decides which bots need which training based on their specializations.

usage.input: Bot ID, material type, source URL/file, topic
typical_use_cases: Oracle finding great engineering video for Gladyce
Oracle providing design principles PDF to Hanna
Oracle distributing AI research to all bots
Oracle pushing specialized training to specific bots
Bots processing inbox materials on boot

access_control.reasoning: Training provision - only Oracle provides training materials
